H0.text: Known as a 'jumper dress' in US-English what garment is named originally from its being attached to the front of a dress. Pinafore

H1.text: Known as a 'jumper dress' in US-English what garment is named originally from its being attached to the front of a dress. Apron

H2.text: Known as a 'jumper dress' in US-English what garment is named originally from its being attached to the front of a dress. Bib

H3.text: Known as a 'jumper dress' in US-English what garment is named originally from its being attached to the front of a dress. Pinny

A4.text: If the design of the dress is directly inspired by an apron (having a bib in front and ties in the back, for example), the garment is typically described as an apron dress.
